text: Thomas Crawford Galbreath (July 28, 1876 – July 24, 1916) was an American football and baseball player. He served as the head football coach at Western Maryland College (now McDaniel College) from 1896 to 1898. He attended Harvard University from 1902 to 1903. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1876 births Category:1916 deaths Category:19th-century players of American football Category:19th-century baseball players Category:McDaniel Green Terror baseball players Category:McDaniel Green Terror football coaches Category:McDaniel Green Terror football players Category:Harvard University alumni Category:People from Harford County, Maryland Category:Players of American football from Maryland
title: Tom Galbreath
